# mainMenu

**Instance Property**

The app’s main menu bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mainMenu: NSMenu? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to assign a new menu bar for your app or to access the current menu bar.

## Accessing the Main Menu

- **isAutomaticCustomizeTouchBarMenuItemEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the main menu contains an item for customizing the contents of the Touch Bar.
